quest.name: The Rainbow Collection
journal: Yagoro needs hard-to-find supplies from hard-to-reach places.
objectives: Obtain a crystal from the orange pond.
Obtain water from the green pond.
Deliver the crystal and water to Yagoro.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: You are Forename, unless I'm mistaken? I have need of your help. Please hear me out.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: You would never guess, but I'm in fact a craftsman by trade. With the Front being constantly shorthanded, however, I've become more of a jack-of-all-trades. Most recently, I've been tasked with procuring certain rare supplies, but it's quite beyond one of my humble abilities. Allow me to explain.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: To the north of here, there lies a peculiar place called Prism Lake. There you'll find exposed deposits of high-purity crystals which, through some trick of the elements, have changed the waters into the colors of the rainbow.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Well, whatever is responsible for this phenomenon seems to have also made the local Namazu uncommonly savage, making it quite impossible for me to do my job.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: However, I believe one of your prowess would have little difficulty. I would be most grateful were you to procure a crystal from the orange pond and some water from the green pond. Rest assured you will be compensated for your troubles.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Were you able to acquire what I asked for?

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I knew I was right to entrust the task to you.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: But tell me, what did you think of the scenery? The place is quite surreal, is it not?

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Legend has it an angel once fell in love with a young nobleman of Doma. Wishing that he joined her in her heavenly domain, she fashioned for him a bridge out of a rainbow.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Alas, the gods were furious that she would bring a lowly mortal to their abode without their permission. And so they destroyed the bridge, reducing it to a thousand thousand pieces, before the nobleman could finish crossing.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: The pieces of this bridge fell to the earth and into a lake, where it imbued the waters with their color. So it was that Prism Lake came to be.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Faerie tales aside, prism crystals are prized as an energy source, while prism water boasts potent healing properties. Both will serve us well in our fight.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Right now, we enjoy the lake for its practical gifts, but one day I hope to simply enjoy it for its beauty. My thanks for your help, Forename.

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
